resources.string: The first anti-bullying in the history of the internet. Designed to protect young people and pre-teens from attacks on the social networks of other groups of their age.
Already a user? Log in now
Make a search to see results
You must specify your last name
The email does not have the correct format
The information provided is not valid
The account is not activated, please check your email to activate it.
The account is pending to be deleted, check your email for more information
Sign up in progress, please wait ...
%s, your account was created successfully, you must check your email to validate it.
Help protect children and youth from harassment and attacks received from social networks.
Register the children to be monitored by the system
Enable access to the social media you want to monitor
We obtain information about your activity in social media
We determine its relationship with the different risk groups
Here you have the main options of the application, you will see results, generated alerts and the list of supervised children in the system
Here you have the children you can tutor, you can access the details of them, in addition to registering a new one in the system
